text: Robert Halley (20 October 1935 â€“ 10 January 2021) was a French politician and businessman. He was born in Cherbourg, France. From 1978 to 2001, Halley served as Mayor of Les Moutiers-Hubert. Halley died on 10 January 2021 in Lisieux, France at the age of 85. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2021 deaths Category:French mayors Category:French businesspeople
title: Robert Halley (politician)
